title: Courses as NFT
description: Courses and content by tutors are ranked based on popularity. Prices of content are varied like NFTs.

title: Community
description: An open network allows the global education community to collaborative develop, improve and expand the content library overtime.

title: Access & Afford
description: Decentralized education marketplace where student can access no cost or free learning resources from around world.

title: Adaptive Learning
description: Use analytics to personalize content, and difficulty levels based on performance like a game.
